content:
summarize this construction opportunity 
The work includes providing all labor, materials, machinery, tools, equipment and other means of construction necessary and incidental to the completion of the work shown on the plans and described in these specifications including, but not necessarily limited to the following:  Roadway Widening and Reconstruction.  
  
Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Set Aside: No
